Text: Still says it is trial once the crack has been copied.
It works but the instructions are wrong. Copy the files first, then you add the serial in control center.
Another crap from fakers please bann this apes admins.

Combine this with ChingLiu patch and it works wonderfully. And the instructions are wrong about updating the Nero components. Just keep replacing the AdvrCntr6.dll & NOSProductRegistration.dll files back in the same folder after you update and it works. Also make sure you apply the patches from ChingLiu FIRST! THEN the crack files and add the serial last in the control center. I hope this helps!
